text: Ferree is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * De Lysle Ferree Cass (1887–1973), American writer * A. I. Ferree (1890–1965), American politician and attorney * Benjy Ferree, American singer/songwriter * Jim Ferree (born 1931), American professional golfer * Myra Marx Ferree (born 1949), American professor * Susan Frances Nelson Ferree (1844-1919), American journalist, activist, suffragist ==See also== * Ferree Covered Bridge, covered bridge located near Rushville, Rush County, Indiana, USA
title: Ferree
